visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should represent monthly average temperatures for a year. Additionally, specify custom colors for the chart and configure other settings such as chart margins, background, and legend.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart titled 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart is styled with a light gray background and specific margins for better visual appeal. The x-axis represents months with styled labels and a title, while the y-axis represents temperature in degrees Celsius. The data series includes monthly average temperatures for a year, with a custom color applied to the series. The legend is enabled and styled to match the overall theme. Additional configurations include a floating subtitle positioned at specific coordinates.
